turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a Caffè Americano from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take that in a grande size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you want to order a grande caffe americano, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a grande caffe americano to be picked up at the starbucks in westlake daly city, ca, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your receipt will be texted to you and your americano will be ready for pickup in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
